templates_data.report_name: All Veeam finished jobs for the last 24h
templates_data.report_description: Provides an overview of Veeam Backup & Replication jobs finished for the last 24 hours.

data.name: All finished jobs for the last 24h
data.description: Provides an overview of Veeam Backup & Replication jobs finished for the last 24 hours.

data.phrase:
dataset in (veeam_*) 
| filter _vendor="Veeam"
| alter 
    _instanceId=arrayindex(regextract(_raw_log, "instanceId\=(\d+)\s"), 0)
| filter _instanceId in ("190","290","150","151","790","194","490","451","390","36022","36026")
| alter 
    _jobResultCode=arrayindex(if(
        _instanceId in ("790"), regextract(_raw_log, "param3\=\"(\d+)\""), 
        _instanceId in ("36022","36026","290"), regextract(_raw_log, "Result\=\"(\d+)\""), 
        _instanceId in ("150","151","451"), regextract(_raw_log, "Status\=\"(\d+)\""), 
        regextract(_raw_log, "JobResult\=\"(\d+)\"")), 0),
    _host=arrayindex(regextract(_raw_log , "\s(\S+)\s(?:Veeam_MP|Veeam_Backup)"), 0)
| filter _host in ($hosts)
| alter _jobResult=if(
    _jobResultCode = "0", "Success",
    _jobResultCode = "1", "Warning",
    _jobResultCode = "2", "Failed",
    _jobResultCode = "3", "Working")
| comp
    count(_instanceId) as _jobsByResult by _jobResult 




| view graph type = pie subtype = full xaxis = _jobResult yaxis = _jobsByResult valuecolor("Success","#00D15F") valuecolor("Failed","#D10000")

dataset in (veeam_*) 
| filter _vendor="Veeam"
| alter 
    _instanceId=arrayindex(regextract(_raw_log, "instanceId\=(\d+)\s"), 0)
| filter _instanceId in ("190","290","150","151","790","194","490","451","390","36022","36026")
| alter 
    _time= parse_timestamp("%FT%H:%M:%E6S%Ez", arrayindex(regextract(_raw_log, "<\d+>1\s+(\S+)\s"), 0)),
    _jobResultCode=arrayindex(if(
        _instanceId in ("790"), regextract(_raw_log, "param3\=\"(\d+)\""), 
        _instanceId in ("36022","36026","290"), regextract(_raw_log, "Result\=\"(\d+)\""), 
        _instanceId in ("150","151","451"), regextract(_raw_log, "Status\=\"(\d+)\""), 
        regextract(_raw_log, "JobResult\=\"(\d+)\"")), 0),
    _jobTypeCode=if(
        _instanceId="290", "290", arrayindex(regextract(_raw_log, "JobType\=\"(\d+)\""), 0)),
    _host=regextract(_raw_log , "\s(\S+)\s(?:Veeam_MP|Veeam_Backup)"),
    _description=arrayindex(regextract(_raw_log, "Description\=\"([^\"]*)(?:\"|$)"),0)
| alter 
    _jobResult=if(
        _jobResultCode = "0", "Success",
        _jobResultCode = "1", "Warning",
        _jobResultCode = "2", "Failed",
        _jobResultCode = "3", "Working"),
    _jobType=if(
        _jobTypeCode = "1","Replication Job",
        _jobTypeCode = "2","Backup Copy Job",
        _jobTypeCode = "3","SureBackup Job",
        _jobTypeCode = "0","Backup Job",
        _jobTypeCode = "8","Quick Migration",
        _jobTypeCode = "22","Rescan Job",
        _jobTypeCode = "24","File to Tape Job",
        _jobTypeCode = "28","Backup to Tape Job",
        _jobTypeCode = "50","Replication Job",
        _jobTypeCode = "51","Backup Copy Job",
        _jobTypeCode = "52","MS SQL Log Backup Job",
        _jobTypeCode = "54","Oracle Log Backup Job",
        _jobTypeCode = "60","HPE StoreOnce Replication Job",
        _jobTypeCode = "63","Backup Copy Job",
        _jobTypeCode = "65","Backup Copy Job",
        _jobTypeCode = "70","Backup Copy Job",
        _jobTypeCode = "74","PostgreSQL Log Backup Job",
        _jobTypeCode = "100","Configuration Backup Job",
        _jobTypeCode = "104","Configuration Database Maintenance Job",
        _jobTypeCode = "202","Restore Job",
        _jobTypeCode = "203","Undo Failover Plan",
        _jobTypeCode = "290","Restore Job",
        _jobTypeCode = "316","CDP Policy",
        _jobTypeCode = "4000","Agent Backup Job (Backup Server)",
        _jobTypeCode = "12000","Agent Backup Job (Backup Server)",
        _jobTypeCode = "12002","Agent Backup Job (Backup Policy)",
        _jobTypeCode = "12003","Agent Backup Job (Backup Server)",
        _jobTypeCode = "13000","File Backup job",
        _jobTypeCode = "13003","File Backup Copy Job",
        _jobTypeCode = "14000","Backup Job",
        _jobTypeCode = "15000","Storage Snapshot Snapshot-Only Job",
        _jobTypeCode = "15001","Storage Snapshot Backup Job",
        _jobTypeCode = "15002","Storage Snapshot Copy Job",
        _jobTypeCode = "15004","Storage Snapshot Restore Session",
        _jobTypeCode = "18000","Archive Tier Backup Job",
        _jobTypeCode = "18001","Archive Tier Restore Session",
        _jobTypeCode = "18002","Archive Download Session",
        _jobTypeCode = "18003","Archive Tier Synchronization Job",
        _jobTypeCode = "18004","Archive Tier Backup Copy Job",
        _jobTypeCode = "18005","Archive Tier Archiving Job",
        _jobTypeCode = "18006","Publish Disk Session",
        _jobTypeCode = "18008","Object Storage Repository Synchronization Job",
        _jobTypeCode = "24002","Guest OS File Restore Session",
        _jobTypeCode = "33000","SureBackup Scan only",
        _jobTypeCode = "33001","SureBackup Scan only")
| sort desc  _time
| fields
    _host as `Data Source`, _time as `Date`, _description as `Message Details`, _jobType as `Job Type`, _jobResult as `State`

widgets_data.title: All Jobs
widgets_data.description: The breakdown of all finished jobs by state.
